node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `document` ( `document_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `doctext` mediumtext COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `edittime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`document_id`), KEY `edittime` (`edittime`), KEY `edittime_2` (`edittime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: document
